flow-definition.description: {{ job.description | default('deploy apps on k8s cluster')}}

org.biouno.unochoice.ChoiceParameter.name: APP_NAMES
org.biouno.unochoice.ChoiceParameter.description: Select which application to deploy on respective cluster

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: ENVIRONMENT_TYPE
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: chose cluster on which we have to deploy the application

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: IMAGE_TAG
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: tag of image to be deployed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: HELM_CHART_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: if not provided it will be evaluated from IMAGE TAG

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DRY_RUN
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If we just want to test pipeline without actually deploying on cluster use it

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: PRODUCTION_TOKEN
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: !! Give only when deploying on production
